name: Mansion Maidhem Demo (Demo)
description:
Monsters have invaded the mansion that you work at! As a maid, it's your job to get rid of them all, and make sure all of the other residents are safe. Ready your magic, because there's a different kind of mess to clean up in this maid metroidvania!

A maidtroidvania!

CONTROLS:
Arrow Keys - Move / Navigate Menus

Down - Interact/Enter Doors

Z - Attack / Confirm

X - Dash (once unlocked) / Cancel

C - Curtsy (it doesn't do anything, it's just polite)

KNOWN ISSUES: 

The saving doesn't work correctly, some of your upgrades may be missing, or you may have upgrades when starting a new game.

(SPOILERS) The Slime King Boss sometimes doesn't destroy his spawned minions upon death.
